updates.description: Shin janki 11, 12 and akagi LA

updates.title: Uzaku tile efficiency (wwyd-chan 3)
updates.description: From the wwyd-chan author, now you get oyakodon! Complete translation of the tile efficiency book. Better get to study if you want to marry Akane.

updates.title: Super closed mahjong (Hag book)
updates.description: Update for the hag book. Still on chapter 1, but improved.

updates.title: Majsoul paifu
updates.description: Give it a link to a majsoul game and it shows your paifu and point graph.

updates.title: 4chan tiles
updates.description: Revival of an old /jp/ script, showing tiles on 4chan. Uses the standard notation (like 123m20p66s27z)

updates.title: Waifu 2x (Update 24/03/22)
updates.description: A mod that uses larger waifu2x versions of every characters emotes instead of the shitty 120x120 emotes that's normally used in game. Added the new emotes for Fuji and green hair guys skins in the Hot Spring event

updates.title: Hana improvement mod
updates.description: Upgrade to literally who. Removes Hana's glasses, gives her longer hair and changes her thigh highs from white to black. Picture comparison here

updates.title: Book dump
updates.description: The 3rd great mahjong dump. Look into this for books not included in the previous one, especially newer stuff. Old man, shibukawa, takizawa, uchikawa, uzaku 4, and so on.

updates.title: Sakurai collection
updates.description: Real flowmaster hours, in 12 simple books. Reading this will take you to celestial in less than 100 hanchans.

updates.title: Kitano dump
updates.description: Some anon got scans from this Kitano mahjong manga. Synopsis? Fuck if I know, it's in Japanese.

updates.title: Waifu 2x (Update 23/02/22)
updates.description: A mod that uses larger waifu2x versions of every characters emotes instead of the shitty 120x120 emotes that's normally used in game. Added the new emotes for Yui and Sawako's skins in the Moonlight Waltz event

updates.title: Statistical Mahjong Strategy (Updated 17/02/22)
updates.description: It's like riichi book 2, but for math addicts. Fixed some typos.

updates.title: Uzaku's 300 wwyd (beta)
updates.description: Learn about tile efficiency and the feeling of having a girlfriend all in one book! Harder prequel of the 301 book. improved version soon(tm)

updates.title: Touhou Gensou Mahjong 4N translation
updates.description: A translation for the touhou mahjong game with superpowers and all of that. Pretty nice, just remember not to run it on japanese locale.

updates.title: Waifu 2x (Update 27/01/22)

updates.title: Fishing Ichihime v.4pin (Update 02/01/22)
updates.description: Fixes a softlock in endless modes. You can just replace your executable with this one, your save files from previous version will be compatible.

updates.title: Fishing Ichihime v.3pin (Update 01/01/22)
updates.description: It should fix bugs reported in the thread. You can just replace your executable with this one, your save files from previous version will be compatible.
